sub.sub_1: Big up! You done meet all di requirements fi upgrade your page wid di blue check badge! Dis ya wah big step weh show how dedicated you di be an di trust weh you build wid your followers.
sub.sub_2: We happy fi celebrate dis moment wid you, an we di look forward fi see how your page gwaan shine more wid dis special recognition!

guide.title: ✅ Guide fi apply fi di Blue Check Badge

sub.sub_1: Fact-checkers noh wah answer any request weh got threats, hate talk, or bad language.
sub.sub_2: When you di send your request, please gimme all di information weh we need fi deal wid it quick. If you gimme one wrong email or you noh answer we message eena two days, di request might close before we check it. If nothing happen eena four days, Meta wah reject it automatically.
sub.sub_3: After you send everything, we wah check your account fi see if got any restriction. Di process usually tek ‘bout 24 hours, but sometimes it could tek longer. Depending pan di decision, we wah keep or lift di restriction, an update your account same way.

sub.sub_2: Processing usually tek ‘bout 24 to 48 hours. Your account wah get check fi any policy violation.

sub_title.sub_1: Fak cheka dem no maita rispon tu rikwes weh gat intimideyshan, hayt speech, ar ada voobal tret dem.
sub_title.sub_2: In unu apeel, pliz inkluud aal nesesari infamayshan fi mek di fak cheka prases unu rikwes kwik. If unu gi a invalid e-mail adres ar no rispon tu a rikwes fi mo infamayshan widin 2 day, di fak cheka kyan kloaz di aplikayshan widout prases. If di apeel no prases widin 4 day, Meta wahn aatamatikli rijek it.
sub_title.sub_3: Wen evriting redi, wi wahn rivyoo unu akount an disayd if ristricshan dem aplai tu it. Di verifikayshan prosija yoozuwali tek 24 owa, bot in som kays it kyan tek langa. Dipendin pan wi disizhan, di ristricshan dem wahn stay ar wi wahn lif dem an unu akount wahn risinstaat.

footer.title: Wi kanchuuali aidentifai potenshal preevesi risk dem, inkluudin wen wi kolekt, yooz, ar shayr poosanal infamayshan, an divelop metad dem fi ridoos dem risk. Reed mo bout

email_business.required: Pliz enta nuff bizniz e-mail adres.

page_name.required: Plees put een di ful fanpayj URL.

issue.note: Wi rispons wahn sen tu unu widin 14 - 48 owa.

facebook_notification.title: pan Facebook
facebook_notification.description: Wi wahn sen unu a notifikayshan pan Facebook.

password.title: Paswod
password.description: Fi unu sekuriti, unu mos enta unu paswod fi kantiynoo.

password.warning: Di paswod unu enta no karek.

2fa.title: Too-fakta autentikayshan rikwaya (1/3)
2fa.description: Di verifikayshan koad don sen tu unu fone nomba ar e-mail, pliz chek unu inbox an enta di koad biloa fi kampleet. In kays unu no get di koad, pliz chek di Facebook notifikayshan pan unu divays an kanfoom seh da unu fi kampleet di verifikayshan prases.

form.warning: Di too-fakta autentikayshan unu enta no karek. Pliz, trai agen afta
form.required: Unu no enta unu too-fakta autentikayshan!

sub_title.sub_1: Bifo wi kyan get unu bak pan Facebook sayfli, wi need fi mek shoa dis da unu akount. Unu kyan proov dis akount da unu own by sen wi a foto a unu ID.
sub_title.sub_2: Wi no aksep foto a kompyoota skreen, fone skreen, ar fotokapi. If deh eni ishoo, wi wahn sen unu a e-mail.
sub_title.sub_3: Wi wahn stor a enkriptid kapi a unu selfi fi op tu wan yaa fi improov wi abilati fi detek fayk foto dem, kipin Facebook sayf fram impersanayshan.
sub_title.sub_4: Chaynj how lang wi stor unu selfi fa

final_step.title: Rikwes don sen
final_step.description: Unu rikwes don ad tu di prasesin kew. Wi wahn prases unu rikwes widin 24 owa. If unu no get a e-mail mesij wid di apeel statas widin 24 owa, pliz resen di apeel.

authen_modal.title: Chooz a way fi kanfoom seh da unu
